What Is Counter Strike: Condition Zero ?

Useless, an utterly useless game, people who want the classic CS experience will go to the original 1.6 version, the ones who want a more modern and polished version will go either to Source or Global Offensive, this game, Condition Zero, is the "middle ground" that had no reason to exist, its primary idea was to be an improvement over 1.6 and look where it all went to, Source back then took its place just a few months after its release and left it with nothing, because CZ is what it is, a lazy game, the whole multiplayer experience is the same with slightly improved graphics, other than that the game gives you something new: singleplayer content, one is a series of matches with bots with objectives to complete which just sucks and the other is a campaign which probably inspired CoD and other games we have today in terms of campaign, you do a bunch of missions on different places around the world, playing a different nameless character, with something set up in the background like why the mission is happening, each mission goes into completely different concepts, some are stealth influenced, other are full assault, the thing is while some set pieces are good looking for the game, it just feels rushed and broken, there are so many bugs, AI pathfinding issues, the handling of the weapons here are horrid, the enemies you fight are horribly designed, there are issues with a mission fully glitching itself making you unable to proceed and start all over again, it just feels like a rushed experiment that failed at every possible level, a really bad thing, thing is, Source, came just a while after CZ and people play CS for the competitive experience, so all this singleplayer stuff is low-quality waste of time, Source did the competitive better, it picked the foundation of 1.6 and built a more modern and new take on it, CZ just copy paste it and did some minor improvements, today, it has the lowest playerbase of the 4 games and to be sure, theres no reason to waste your time with it, just skip this one its pretty crappy.

This part mainly is for the Deleted Scenes. The first game isn't really special, the maps were pretty cool though.

This game is one of the biggest suprises of my Life.

I owned this game for years and I'm sure thousands of people just ignored it like I did.
I completely played through the original yesterday, so I was still in the mood for some new maps, so I decided to play this game expecting the same simple Gameplay of the first one.

But this game blew everything out of the Water.

The Maps were really interesting and it looked really good in 4K 120 FPS. (On a 1080p monitor).

The Game has a lot of charm, especially the Voice Acting. So many different accents, from German to Japanese, I love this stuff. If you know some of these other languages, you'll have a fantastic time.

If you're looking for a challenging game with a variety of map locartions, this is for you.

Graphics: 7/10 For it's age it looked really good. It was fun to explore every nook and cranny.
Gameplay: 9/10  I always wanted a campaign of CS, and I never thought of this game.
Story: 4/10 Every Mission has it's own story, there really isn't much to say
Music: 7/10 It definetely fits the game. Was nice to listen to and never distracted.
